description: Jamapi was once the pet of akuma general Pluie. He was swayed by Wedding Peach`s love waves, and turned good and became the companion of Ai Tenshi. Jamapi acts as the informat of the Ai Tenshi, telling them whenever there is an akuma, the akuma`s name, and what it does (for Jamapi did live in the akuma world). He had two other tukaima companions, whom Wedding Peach also helped turned good.
name: Jamapii
